heresies.name: Docetism
heresies.false_teaching: Jesus only appeared to be human
heresies.catholic_truth: Christ is fully God and fully man

heresies.name: Arianism
heresies.catholic_truth: Christ is fully God and fully man

heresies.name: Nestorianism
heresies.false_teaching: Jesus is two 'persons' - Jesus the human son of Mary and Jesus the divine Son of God
heresies.catholic_truth: Christ is one person with two natures: divine nature and human nature

heresies.name: Monophysitism
heresies.false_teaching: Jesus is fully God but not fully man
heresies.catholic_truth: Christ has two natures: divine nature and human nature

heresies.name: Monothelitism
heresies.catholic_truth: Christ has two wills: a divine will and a human will belonging to His human soul

heresies.name: Iconoclasm
heresies.catholic_truth: The Catholic Church defends the use of Christian (not pagan) images since Christ became visible through the incarnation

heresies.name: Pelagianism
heresies.false_teaching: Denies original sin and teaches that grace is not necessary for salvation
heresies.catholic_truth: We are born in original sin and saved by grace through faith and works

catholic_teachings_about_jesus: One divine person with two natures (divine & human)
Rose from the dead and is seated at Father's right hand
